ar: مَّا كَانَ مُحَمَّدٌ أَبَآ أَحَدٍ مِّن رِّجَالِكُمْ
en: Muhammad is not the father of [any] one of your men,
but [he is] the Messenger of Allah
but [he is] the Messenger of Allah
and seal [i.e., last] of the prophets.
And ever is Allah, of all things, Knowing.
And exalt Him morning and afternoon.
It is He who confers blessing upon you, and His angels [ask Him to do so]
It is He who confers blessing upon you, and His angels [ask Him to do so]
that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light.
And ever is He, to the believers, Merciful.
Their greeting the Day they meet Him will be,
Their greeting the Day they meet Him will be,
And He has prepared for them a noble reward.
